name: Devil World
description: Devil World (デビルワールド, Debiru Wārudo) is a maze video game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Entertainment System. It was released in Japan on October 5, 1984 and in Europe on July 15, 1987. The game was also released on the Wii's Virtual Console in Japan on January 22, 2008 and in PAL regions on October 31, 2008. Due to Nintendo of America's strict policies on the use of religious icons in games, it was not released in North America.
